quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Happy is the man who finds a true friend, and far happier is he who finds that true friend in his wife.
name: Franz Schubert

quote: Let the wife make the husband glad to come home, and let him make her sorry to see him leave.
name: Martin Luther

quote: My most brilliant achievement was my ability to be able to persuade my wife to marry me.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: A good husband makes a good wife.
name: John Florio

quote: When a man opens a car door for his wife, it's either a new car or a new wife.
name: Prince Philip

quote: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage.
name: Martin Luther

quote: A good marriage would be between a blind wife and a deaf husband.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Marriage is not about age; it's about finding the right person.
name: Sophia Bush

quote: If I get married, I want to be very married.
name: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Marriage is good for those who are afraid to sleep alone at night.
name: St. Jerome

quote: Marriage is neither heaven nor hell, it is simply purgatory.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: An ideal wife is any woman who has an ideal husband.
name: Booth Tarkington

quote: A marriage doesn't have to be perfect, but you can be perfect for each other.
name: Jessica Simpson

quote: Many people spend more time in planning the wedding than they do in planning the marriage.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: Marriage is the most natural state of man, and... the state in which you will find solid happiness.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Love is moral even without legal marriage, but marriage is immoral without love.
name: Ellen Key

quote: One should believe in marriage as in the immortality of the soul.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: In a happy marriage it is the wife who provides the climate, the husband the landscape.
name: Gerald Brenan

quote: Friendship is the marriage of the soul, and this marriage is liable to divorce.
name: Voltaire

quote: May this marriage be full of laughter, our every day in paradise.
name: Rumi

quote: May these vows and this marriage be blessed.
name: Rumi

quote: When I'm weak, you can be strong; when I'm strong, you can be weak. That's what I believe marriage is.
name: Gisele Bundchen

quote: A wedding is a funeral where you smell your own flowers.
name: Eddie Cantor

quote: The secret of a happy marriage remains a secret.
name: Henny Youngman

quote: A happy marriage is a long conversation which always seems too short.
name: Andre Maurois

quote: Keep your eyes wide open before marriage, half shut afterwards.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The first time you marry for love, the second for money, and the third for companionship.
name: Jackie Kennedy

quote: Marriage is an adventure, like going to war.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: A successful marriage is an edifice that must be rebuilt every day.
name: Andre Maurois

quote: I support gay marriage. I believe they have a right to be as miserable as the rest of us.
name: Kinky Friedman

quote: Where there's marriage without love, there will be love without marriage.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Nobody, man or woman, has ever wrecked a good marriage.
name: Jimmy Dean

quote: Marriage is a wonderful institution, but who wants to live in an institution?
name: Groucho Marx

quote: It's tough to stay married. My wife kisses the dog on the lips, yet she won't drink from my glass.
name: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: Remember that creating a successful marriage is like farming: you have to start over again every morning.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: I married the first man I ever kissed. When I tell this to my children, they just about throw up.
name: Barbara Bush

quote: A man in love is incomplete until he has married. Then he's finished.
name: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: A journey is like marriage. The certain way to be wrong is to think you control it.
name: John Steinbeck

quote: My wife is my soul mate. I can't imagine being without her.
name: Matt Damon

quote: Love: A temporary insanity curable by marriage.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: The most happy marriage I can picture or imagine to myself would be the union of a deaf man to a blind woman.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: I haven't been faithful to my wife. Our marriage has been tainted with my infidelities. I was irresponsible.
name: David Boreanaz

quote: A bride at her second marriage does not wear a veil. She wants to see what she is getting.
name: Helen Rowland

quote: Marriage is really tough because you have to deal with feelings... and lawyers.
name: Richard Pryor

quote: I think that gay marriage should be between a man and a woman.
name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Marriage equality is about more than just marriage. It's about something greater. It's about acceptance.
name: Charlize Theron

quote: Politics doesn't make strange bedfellows - marriage does.
name: Groucho Marx

quote: Marriage is a great institution, but I'm not ready for an institution.
name: Mae West

quote: The great marriages are partnerships. It can't be a great marriage without being a partnership.
name: Helen Mirren

quote: There's only one way to have a happy marriage and as soon as I learn what it is I'll get married again.
name: Clint Eastwood

quote: Not cohabitation but consensus constitutes marriage.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: If there is such a thing as a good marriage, it is because it resembles friendship rather than love.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: It is always incomprehensible to a man that a woman should ever refuse an offer of marriage.
name: Jane Austen

quote: Marriage is an attempt to solve problems together which you didn't even have when you were on your own.
name: Eddie Cantor

quote: You can't have a happy family if you don't have a happy marriage.
name: Jeremy Sisto

quote: They say marriage will change you but it didn't change me. Being in love changed me.
name: R. Kelly

quote: Gay marriage acceptance is happening in the blink of an eye.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Wit is the sudden marriage of ideas which, before their union, were not perceived to have any relation.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Love is not weakness. It is strong. Only the sacrament of marriage can contain it.
name: Boris Pasternak

quote: As to marriage or celibacy, let a man take which course he will, he will be sure to repent.
name: Socrates

quote: Marriage is like putting your hand into a bag of snakes in the hope of pulling out an eel.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Married men live longer than single men. But married men are a lot more willing to die.
name: Johnny Carson

quote: When you make the sacrifice in marriage, you're sacrificing not to each other but to unity in a relationship.
name: Joseph Campbell

quote: There is, hidden or flaunted, a sword between the sexes till an entire marriage reconciles them.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: I definitely have a happy marriage and family life.
name: Viola Davis

quote: A troubled marriage can be as hazardous to physical health as cigarette smoking.
name: Robert J. Waldinger

quote: Marriage has no guarantees. If that's what you're looking for, go live with a car battery.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: Marriage is the grave or tomb of wit.
name: Margaret Cavendish

quote: A good husband is never the first to go to sleep at night or the last to awake in the morning.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Whenever a husband and wife begin to discuss their marriage they are giving evidence at a coroner's inquest.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: The biggest financial pitfall in life is divorce. And the biggest reason for divorce is marriage.
name: Gene Simmons

quote: I love marriage. I think it's a wonderful institution and it's the most important decision you make.
name: Isla Fisher

quote: Never stay in a bad marriage, and don't hang around with psycho coke fiends.
name: Joe Rogan

quote: I love the concept of togetherness and the entwinement of marriage.
name: William Shatner

quote: I don't understand what the big deal is with gay marriage. Get over it, people.
name: Kristin Chenoweth

quote: A sap run is the sweet goodbye of winter. It is the fruit of the equal marriage of the sun and frost.
name: John Burroughs

quote: A key to keeping your husband is getting him to miss you. That keeps a marriage fresh.
name: Tori Amos

quote: For marriage to be a success, every woman and every man should have her and his own bathroom. The end.
name: Catherine Zeta-Jones

quote: Only after I faced the unhappiness of my first marriage did I start on the path of personal growth.
name: Judith Wright

quote: Marriage changes everything.
name: Marilyn Manson

quote: Basically my wife was immature. I'd be at home in the bath and she'd come in and sink my boats.
name: Woody Allen

quote: Marriage is miserable unless you find the right person that is your soulmate and that takes a lot of looking.
name: Marvin Gaye

quote: Obama is for same-sex marriage. If the president is saying that, then who am I to go the other way?
name: Curtis Jackson

quote: Always remember that the most important thing in a good marriage is not happiness, but stability.
name: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quote: My mother had a son from previous marriage and her husband died in Second World War.
name: Mikhail Baryshnikov

quote: I like marriage. The idea.
name: Toni Morrison

quote: Courtship is to marriage, as a very witty prologue to a very dull play.
name: William Congreve

quote: It's not always been a happy marriage. I guess I wanted a quick fix.
name: David Byrne

quote: I had 53 years of happy marriage and two daughters. These were the best things that happened in my life.
name: Henry Allingham

quote: I had a happy marriage and a nice wife. I accomplished everything you can. What more can you want?
name: Max Schmeling

quote: It is my conviction that marriage is such a good idea, only God could have thought of it.
name: Myles Munroe

quote: People say, 'What's the secret to a marriage?' There's no secret - I think you get lucky.
name: Steve Carell

quote: Any sex outside of the marriage bond between a man and a woman is violating God's law.
name: Jerry Falwell

quote: I was against gay marriage until I realized I didn't have to get one.
name: James Carville

quote: The difficulty with marriage is that we fall in love with a personality, but must live with a character.
name: Peter De Vries

quote: Gay marriage won't be more of an issue 25 years from now than interracial marriage is today.
name: Jared Polis

quote: Bachelors have consciences, married men have wives.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: Marrying for love may be a bit risky, but it is so honest that God can't help but smile on it.
name: Josh Billings

quote: Many a good hanging prevents a bad marriage.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: One should always be in love. That is the reason one should never marry.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Love, the quest; marriage, the conquest; divorce, the inquest.
name: Helen Rowland

quote: The one charm about marriage is that it makes a life of deception absolutely necessary for both parties.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: How marriage ruins a man! It is as demoralizing as cigarettes, and far more expensive.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: I don't think marriage is a civil right, but I think that being able to transfer property is a civil right.
name: Barack Obama

quote: Ultimately, my greatest achievement is maintaining my career while sustaining a happy marriage and kids.
name: Melina Kanakaredes

quote: All men make mistakes, but married men find out about them sooner.
name: Red Skelton

quote: Marriage is popular because it combines the maximum of temptation with the maximum of opportunity.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The secret to a long marriage is to stay gone.
name: Dolly Parton

quote: I believe a marriage is between a man and a woman.
name: George W. Bush

quote: There is no subject on which more dangerous nonsense is talked and thought than marriage.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Marriage is good enough for the lower classes: they have facilities for desertion that are denied to us.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Our Nation must defend the sanctity of marriage.
name: George W. Bush

quote: They dream in courtship, but in wedlock wake.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: Marriage is about the most expensive way for the average man to get laundry done.
name: Burt Reynolds

quote: I'm not for gay marriage, but I'm not for discriminating against people.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: Marriage, to women as to men, must be a luxury, not a necessity; an incident of life, not all of it.
name: Susan B. Anthony

quote: Happiness in marriage is entirely a matter of chance.
name: Jane Austen

quote: My marriage is on the rocks again, yeah, my wife just broke up with her boyfriend.
name: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: Marriage is a wonderful institution, but who would want to live in an institution?
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: I don't think that a same-sex marriage is the way God intended it to be.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: Marrying an old bachelor is like buying second-hand furniture.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: In the course of a marriage, one accommodates the other.
name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: If you want to sacrifice the admiration of many men for the criticism of one, go ahead, get married.
name: Katharine Hepburn

quote: Sometimes divorce is better than marriage.
name: Sumner Redstone

quote: Marriage has made me a lot happier and I'm deeply in love with my wife, and I thank God for her every day.
name: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: There were three of us in this marriage, so it was a bit crowded.
name: Princess Diana

quote: People today expect too much from marriage. Getting married is really like taking on a big new job.
name: Rosamunde Pilcher

quote: Bachelors know more about women than married men; if they didn't they'd be married too.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: A marriage is no amusement but a solemn act, and generally a sad one.
name: Queen Victoria

quote: He's the kind of man a woman would have to marry to get rid of.
name: Mae West

quote: I was a happy person before marriage. I'm definitely happier after marriage.
name: Vidya Balan

quote: Marriage may often be a stormy lake, but celibacy is almost always a muddy horse pond.
name: Thomas Love Peacock

quote: A sense of humor is great - it goes a long, long way in a marriage.
name: Chris Rock

quote: Marriage is a gamble, let's be honest.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: Marriage destroyed my relationship with two wonderful men.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: The first breath of adultery is the freest; after it, constraints aping marriage develop.
name: John Updike

quote: Marriage: A word which should be pronounced 'mirage'.
name: Herbert Spencer

quote: Marriage is a mystery, and part of it is just being kind to each other, not being selfish.
name: Aisha Tyler

quote: Marriage is a commitment for life. It is a permanent, lifelong relationship.
name: Dada Vaswani

quote: More belongs to marriage than four legs in a bed.
name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: The Bible is clear - God's definition of marriage is between a man and a woman.
name: Billy Graham

quote: I believe the home and marriage is the foundation of our society and must be protected.
name: Billy Graham

quote: No person connected with me by blood or marriage will be appointed to office.
name: Rutherford B. Hayes

quote: If traditional marriage is not the law of the land, the institution of the family will cease to exist.
name: James Dobson

quote: When I get married, it'll be no secret.
name: Elvis Presley

quote: We want our marriage to be a triumph, not a tragedy.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: She's been married so many times she has rice marks on her face.
name: Henny Youngman

quote: Marriage is like life - it is a field of battle, not a bed of roses.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: No man is regular in his attendance at the House of Commons until he is married.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Gay marriage is going to happen. It must.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: We live too long for one marriage.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: It's not beauty but fine qualities, my girl, that keep a husband.
name: Euripides

quote: I am a fan of marriage and a fan of being committed to the right person.
name: Joan Collins

quote: A wife lasts only for the length of the marriage, but an ex-wife is there for the rest of your life.
name: Jim Samuels

quote: Marriage should be a duet - when one sings, the other claps.
name: Joe Murray

quote: A good marriage is different to a happy marriage.
name: Debra Winger

quote: I think marriage is a boring and fault-ridden contractual obligation.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: Marriage: A friendship recognized by the police.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: In marriage, a man becomes slack and selfish, and undergoes a fatty degeneration of his moral being.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: When people get married young, you don't really understand the true definition of marriage.
name: Kevin Hart

quote: Marriage is the most wonderful thing ever.
name: Kevin Gates

quote: In marriage, compromise nurtures the relationship.
name: Tim Allen

quote: Marriage is the death of hope.
name: Woody Allen

quote: When you have a baby, love is automatic, when you get married, love is earned.
name: Marie Osmond

quote: The cultural expectation should be if there's infidelity, the marriage is more important than fidelity.
name: Dan Savage

quote: It is better to be unhappy in love than unhappy in marriage, but some people manage to be both.
name: Guy de Maupassant

quote: I don't know if I believe in marriage - I believe in love.
name: Romeo Santos

quote: I have not supported same-sex marriage. I have supported civil partnerships and contractual relationships.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: Every marriage is a mystery to me, even the one I'm in. So I'm no expert on it.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: I've had an exciting time; I married for love and got a little money along with it.
name: Rose Kennedy

quote: Marriage is one long conversation, chequered by disputes.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Instead of getting married again, I'm going to find a woman I don't like and give her a house.
name: Lewis Grizzard

quote: I'm more afraid of marriage than death.
name: Shakira

quote: Marriage is not just spiritual communion, it is also remembering to take out the trash.
name: Joyce Brothers

quote: I'm certain that most couples expect to find intimacy in marriage, but it somehow eludes them.
name: James Dobson

quote: Marriage is a wonderful invention: then again, so is a bicycle repair kit.
name: Billy Connolly

quote: I only gave out my opinion that same sex marriage is against the law of God.
name: Manny Pacquiao

quote: Men who have a pierced ear are better prepared for marriage - they've experienced pain and bought jewelry.
name: Rita Rudner

quote: Marriage can be a magnificent lesson in becoming our best selves; that is true.
name: Marianne Williamson

quote: Little children are still the symbol of the eternal marriage between love and duty.
name: George Eliot

quote: Marriage must be a relation either of sympathy or of conquest.
name: George Eliot

quote: In olden times sacrifices were made at the altar - a practice which is still continued.
name: Helen Rowland

quote: I love the institution of marriage, and I love my marriage.
name: Kyle Chandler

quote: I believe in the institution of marriage, and I intend to keep trying till I get it right.
name: Richard Pryor

quote: The only good husbands stay bachelors: They're too considerate to get married.
name: Finley Peter Dunne

quote: Marriage is give and take. You'd better give it to her or she'll take it anyway.
name: Joey Adams

quote: A psychiatrist asks a lot of expensive questions your wife asks for nothing.
name: Joey Adams

quote: Marriage can be viewed as the waiting room for death.
name: Mike Myers

quote: I don't have any romantic ideas about marriage. Trust me. A white dress... ? No. It's not something for me.
name: Diane Kruger

quote: The critical period of matrimony is breakfast-time.
name: A. P. Herbert

quote: My parents' long and happy marriage was a great ideal to live up to, but a tough one.
name: Olivia Williams

quote: In all seriousness, I don't get people who need to make a proposal a bigger deal than marriage already is.
name: Julie Klausner

quote: I'm a heathen when it comes to marriage.
name: Greta Scacchi

quote: I don't think my wife likes me very much, when I had a heart attack she wrote for an ambulance.
name: Frank Carson

quote: It takes two to make a marriage a success and only one to make it a failure.
name: Herbert Samuel

quote: Marriage, a market which has nothing free but the entrance.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Marriage is a series of desperate arguments people feel passionately about.
name: Katharine Hepburn

quote: Books and marriage go ill together.
name: Moliere

quote: Well married a person has wings, poorly married shackles.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Marriage is a very good thing, but I think it's a mistake to make a habit out of it.
name: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Marriage is a great institution.
name: Elizabeth Taylor

quote: Marriage is the torment of one, the felicity of two, the strife and enmity of three.
name: Washington Irving

quote: A liberated woman is one who has sex before marriage and a job after.
name: Gloria Steinem

quote: I have yet to hear a man ask for advice on how to combine marriage and a career.
name: Gloria Steinem

quote: Marriage is nature's way of keeping us from fighting with strangers.
name: Alan King

quote: How hard it is to have the beautiful interdependence of marriage and yet be strong in oneself alone.
name: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Take this marriage thing seriously - it has to last all the way to the divorce.
name: Roseanne Barr

quote: Only choose in marriage a man whom you would choose as a friend if he were a woman.
name: Joseph Joubert

quote: Here in Hollywood you can actually get a marriage license printed on an Etch-A-Sketch.
name: Dennis Miller

quote: Never again! I can see no reason for marriage - ever at all. I've had it. Three times is enough.
name: Ingrid Bergman

quote: I think marriage is a beautiful thing. I'm still a supporter of it.
name: Nas

quote: Every marriage tends to consist of an aristocrat and a peasant. Of a teacher and a learner.
name: John Updike

quote: After marriage, the other man's wife looks more beautiful.
name: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quote: In Hollywood a marriage is a success if it outlasts milk.
name: Rita Rudner

quote: The sweet companionship of eternal marriage is one of the greatest blessings God has granted to His children.
name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: Marriage is a good deal like a circus: there is not as much in it as is represented in the advertising.
name: E. W. Howe

quote: The weaker partner in a marriage is the one who loves the most.
name: Eleonora Duse

quote: My marriage and my families come certainly before my career.
name: Michael Douglas

quote: Marriage isn't a carnival ride.
name: Aisha Tyler

quote: You have to do the work in your marriage, but it has to be laid on a strong foundation of love.
name: Robin Wright

quote: The majority of husbands remind me of an orangutan trying to play the violin.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Marriage must incessantly contend with a monster that devours everything: familiarity.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: It takes a lot of work to put together a marriage, to put together a family and a home.
name: Elizabeth Edwards

quote: Many a man in love with a dimple makes the mistake of marrying the whole girl.
name: Stephen Leacock

quote: I tell people marriage is a compromise, and so are renovations.
name: Candice Olson

quote: Traditional marriage is what should be sanctioned.
name: Jeb Bush

quote: I think that sense of humor is important in marriage. A sense of humor gets people through marriage.
name: Kyle Chandler

quote: Marriage is hard work, period.
name: Kyle Chandler

quote: Marriage is such a mark of adulthood in my mind.
name: Mandy Moore

quote: I'm for gay marriage, because I'm for gay divorce.
name: Melissa Etheridge

quote: Nothing scares me about marriage.
name: Divyanka Tripathi

quote: What is marriage but prostitution to one man instead of many?
name: Angela Carter

quote: I'm an activist for gay marriage equality and children's rights. I'm the face of Share Our Strength.
name: Sandra Lee

quote: Marriage is this grand madness, and I think if people knew that, they would perhaps take it more seriously.
name: Bono

quote: Marriage is socialism among two people.
name: Barbara Ehrenreich

quote: Same sex marriage, it's not a big concern to me.
name: Tomi Lahren

quote: I'll say this: The media wasn't invited to my marriage, and they're definitely not invited into the divorce.
name: Ryan Reynolds

quote: Marriage requires a special talent, like acting. Monogamy requires genius.
name: Warren Beatty

quote: I've always been suspicious of TV, I've always found music and video to be an unhappy marriage.
name: Keith Richards

quote: Whoever, fleeing marriage and the sorrows that women cause, does not wish to wed comes to a deadly old age.
name: Hesiod

quote: All marriages are happy. It's the living together afterward that causes all the trouble.
name: Raymond Hull

quote: Homosexual marriage is counterfeit marriage.
name: Robert Jeffress

quote: I found marriage somewhat stifling. I don't know that I am the kind of man who ought to be married.
name: Burt Lancaster

quote: The first condition of marriage between a man and a woman is that both must belong to each other totally.
name: Munshi Premchand

quote: I had only two offers of marriage in my life, and I refused both.
name: Catherine Helen Spence

quote: I don't see any reason for marriage when there is divorce.
name: Catherine Deneuve

quote: Never feel remorse for what you have thought about your wife; she has thought much worse things about you.
name: Jean Rostand

quote: I believe in gay marriage.
name: David H. Koch

quote: I am an activist and rapper from Afghanistan, and I use rap to speak out and help end child marriage.
name: Sonita Alizadeh

quote: Life changed a lot after marriage. I am not the same person as before.
name: Allu Arjun

quote: I believe in traditional marriage.
name: Karl Rove

quote: If we did not look to marriage as the principal source of happiness, fewer marriages would end in tears.
name: Anthony Storr

quote: Marriage Asian-style is practical, contractual and, to the western mind, deeply unromantic.
name: Jemima Khan

quote: The seeds of marriage equality... were planted on MTV.
name: Wilson Cruz

quote: A lot of books about marriage are about marriages falling apart.
name: Lauren Groff

quote: Marriage, laws, the police, armies and navies are the mark of human incompetence.
name: Dora Russell

quote: You don't want your marriage to be sustainable. You want to be evolving, nurturing, learning.
name: Mitchell Joachim

quote: If love means never having to say you're sorry, then marriage means always having to say everything twice.
name: Estelle Getty

quote: We want a marriage with our customers, not a relationship.
name: Daniel Drew

quote: In the future, I want a movie career, kids and a happy marriage.
name: Vendela Kirsebom

quote: The most important thing for a good marriage is to learn how to argue peaceably.
name: Anita Ekberg

quote: Brought up to respect the conventions, love had to end in marriage. I'm afraid it did.
name: Bette Davis

quote: My mother was born in Baltimore, and before her marriage, she was an artist and teacher of art.
name: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quote: My thoughts are that marriage is between a man and a woman.
name: Ben Carson

quote: Marriage is the hardest work you're ever going to do.
name: Julie Andrews

quote: All that a husband or wife really wants is to be pitied a little, praised a little, and appreciated a little.
name: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: I don't know about marriage as much as I do know that I'd be a great father.
name: Tyler Perry

quote: Love is often the fruit of marriage.
name: Moliere

quote: It's nice to know you have support. Last night I got a marriage proposal. I just laughed.
name: Carrie Underwood

quote: I love John Irving's stuff. It's that marriage of comedy and tragedy. It's really terrific.
name: Jeff Bridges

quote: Sticking with a marriage. That's true grit, man.
name: Jeff Bridges

quote: I love marriage.
name: Jeff Bridges

quote: In a marriage, every fight is the same fight, over and over again, in different forms.
name: Jeff Bridges

quote: Husbands are like fires - they go out when they're left unattended.
name: Cher

quote: To me marriage is for five or ten years.
name: Cher

quote: Nothing in life is as good as the marriage of true minds between man and woman. As good? It is life itself.
name: Pearl S. Buck

quote: If variety is the spice of life, marriage is the big can of leftover Spam.
name: Johnny Carson

quote: Marriage was never my goal, because I've never been very traditional.
name: Chrissy Teigen

quote: For me, personally, marriage is a man and a woman living together.
name: Angela Merkel

quote: People might be surprised because I settled for an arranged marriage, but that's what's chosen for us.
name: Karan Patel

quote: If you want to read about love and marriage, you've got to buy two separate books.
name: Alan King

quote: Marriage is a feast where the grace is sometimes better than the dinner.
name: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Accident counts for as much in companionship as in marriage.
name: Henry Adams

quote: It was a perfect marriage. She didn't want to and he couldn't.
name: Spike Milligan

quote: Marriage is a bribe to make the housekeeper think she's a householder.
name: Thornton Wilder

quote: Marriage is an institution, and you must be fully committed to it.
name: Gene Simmons

quote: Marriage equality is not a choice. It is a legal right.
name: Cory Booker

quote: I believe that marriage should be between one man and one woman.
name: Mitch McConnell

quote: Well, you know, I just - I believe marriage should between a man and a woman.
name: Victoria Osteen

quote: I yearned for a long, happy marriage with one person.
name: Ginger Rogers

quote: She got the magazine on a Wednesday morning, and on Thursday announced our marriage was over.
name: David Gest

quote: Well, you know, the definition of second marriage is the triumph of hope over experience.
name: George Will

quote: Marriages, like careers, need constant nurturing... the secret of having it all is loving it all.
name: Joyce Brothers

quote: Marriage is wonderful.
name: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Marriage, it seems, confines every man to his proper rank.
name: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Marriage! Nothing else demands so much of a man.
name: Henrik Ibsen

quote: One doesn't have to get anywhere in a marriage. It's not a public conveyance.
name: Iris Murdoch

quote: Marriage can be expensive, and if I lose millions then it'll be the best millions I've spent.
name: Seth Rogen

quote: Having had five husbands, I guess I should know a thing or two about marriage.
name: Joan Collins

quote: I feel that whoever isn't feeling settled in their career won't think about their marriage.
name: Ram Charan

quote: Divorce these days is a religious vow, as if the proper offspring of marriage.
name: Tertullian

quote: Getting divorced just because you don't love a man is almost as silly as getting married just because you do.
name: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: Of course I love being in love - but it is marriage that really fulfills me. But not in every case.
name: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: I swear Kim Kardashian's first marriage lasted longer than some of my iPhone chargers.
name: Lilly Singh

quote: I never even had a bachelorhood: I went straight from my parents' home to a marriage.
name: Dick Van Dyke

quote: Sometimes I bust out and do things so permanent. Like tattoos and marriage.
name: Drew Barrymore

quote: A marriage without conflicts is almost as inconceivable as a nation without crises.
name: Andre Maurois

quote: Marriage is scary to me, man.
name: The Weeknd

quote: We are properly ready for marriage when we are strong enough to embrace a life of frustration.
name: Alain de Botton

quote: What is fascinating about marriage is why anyone wants to get married.
name: Alain de Botton

quote: To a shameful extent, the charm of marriage boils down to how unpleasant it is to be alone.
name: Alain de Botton

quote: Marriage: a ceremony in which rings are put on the finger of the lady and through the nose of the gentleman.
name: Herbert Spencer

quote: I prepare myself for rehearsals like I would for marriage.
name: Maria Callas

quote: Marriage may be the closest thing to Heaven or Hell any of us will know on this earth.
name: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: A marriage ends up being a business deal: no matter how long or short it is, somebody owes somebody money.
name: Goldie Hawn

quote: Art is a marriage of the conscious and the unconscious.
name: Jean Cocteau

quote: Always get married in the morning. That way if it doesn't work out, you haven't wasted the whole day.
name: Mickey Rooney

quote: Our marriage is strictly in name only. It has never been consummated.
name: LaToya Jackson

quote: It's important to show each other your marriage is a priority.
name: Zoe Foster Blake

quote: The more time you invest in a marriage, the more valuable it becomes.
name: Amy Grant

quote: I do not think that marriage is one of my talents. I've been much happier unmarried than married.
name: Doris Lessing

quote: The comfortable estate of widowhood is the only hope that keeps up a wife's spirits.
name: John Gay

quote: Any intelligent woman who reads the marriage contract, and then goes into it, deserves all the consequences.
name: Isadora Duncan

quote: A husband is what is left of a lover, after the nerve has been extracted.
name: Helen Rowland

quote: Marriage is the miracle that transforms a kiss from a pleasure into a duty.
name: Helen Rowland

quote: My father was very big on marriage.
name: Sidney Poitier

quote: He that loves not his wife and children feeds a lioness at home, and broods a nest of sorrows.
name: Jeremy Taylor

quote: I ran to my marriage, I was happily ready to take on marriage.
name: Mark Ruffalo

quote: I think marriage is all about timing.
name: Cate Blanchett

quote: Have you ever heard of a good marriage growing in front of the cameras?
name: Brigitte Bardot

quote: I am against marriage, and I don't give a fig for society.
name: Brigitte Bardot

quote: I think marriage is a scary concept. It's a scary concept for anybody. I'm not sure where I sit with that.
name: Hozier

quote: Marriage can be tricky and challenging at times.
name: John Rampton

quote: I like marriage. I feel very secure. It helps when you are in love with the person you are married to.
name: Claire Danes

quote: Good production is like a beautiful marriage. It makes a happy home.
name: Timbaland

quote: Marriage is the tomb of love.
name: Giacomo Casanova

quote: I believe that the dissolution of a marriage comes about by the breaking down of self-esteem.
name: Dixie Carter

quote: Marriage, or any committed partnership, has become sacred to me, powerful and fragile all at the same time.
name: Emily V. Gordon

quote: I definitely believe in marriage.
name: Michael Strahan

quote: Is marriage for ever? I think you get married with the intention that it will be, but who knows?
name: Courteney Cox

quote: It's so easy to grow apart; marriage takes work.
name: Courteney Cox

quote: A so-called happy marriage corresponds to love as a correct poem to an improvised song.
name: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quote: Love in marriage should be the accomplishment of a beautiful dream, and not, as it too often is, the end.
name: Alphonse Karr

quote: I married beneath me, all women do.
name: Nancy Astor

quote: Protecting the institution of marriage safeguards, I believe, the American family.
name: John Boehner

quote: Marriage has changed things. I have my own family now.
name: Lin Dan

quote: I think there's something unromantic about marriage. You're closing yourself off.
name: Hugh Grant

quote: I think marriage is only necessary if you've got children. It's quite nice for them.
name: Hugh Grant

quote: I would say that I wasn't so much afraid of marriage as afraid of divorce.
name: Warren Beatty

quote: Marriages are made in heaven and consummated on Earth.
name: John Lyly

quote: Marriage is a mistake every man should make.
name: George Jessel

quote: Marriage, like money, is still with us; and, like money, progressively devalued.
name: Robert Graves

quote: When a man steals your wife, there is no better revenge than to let him keep her.
name: Sacha Guitry

quote: An ideal wife is one who remains faithful to you but tries to be just as charming as if she weren't.
name: Sacha Guitry

quote: The secret of a good marriage is forgiving your partner for marrying you in the first place.
name: Sacha Guitry

quote: Marriage: love, honor, and negotiate.
name: Joe Moore

quote: One was never married, and that's his hell; another is, and that's his plague.
name: Robert Burton

quote: Marriage is actually really terrifying. It doesn't work for many people.
name: Katherine Heigl

quote: Early marriage is most prevalent in communities suffering deep, chronic poverty.
name: Helene D. Gayle

quote: I enjoy being single, but I loved being married.
name: Stephanie Mills

quote: Marriage is a financial contract; I have enough contracts already.
name: Linda Fiorentino

quote: Faithful women are all alike, they think only of their fidelity, never of their husbands.
name: Jean Giraudoux

quote: When I was being sold into marriage, it was hard to see a future for myself.
name: Sonita Alizadeh

quote: I like getting married, but I don't like being married.
name: Don Adams

quote: Marriage - a book of which the first chapter is written in poetry and the remaining chapters in prose.
name: Beverley Nichols

quote: Marriage is like wine. It is not be properly judged until the second glass.
name: Douglas William Jerrold

quote: You can't know about marriage until you try it.
name: Greg Evigan

quote: Conventional wisdom tells us we'll only be happier after a divorce if the marriage itself was a war zone.
name: Ariel Gore

quote: I think infidelity is difficult, monogamy is difficult, and marriage is difficult.
name: Maura Tierney

quote: The best way to get most husbands to do something is to suggest that perhaps they're too old to do it.
name: Ann Bancroft

quote: I made a very poor decision in my first marriage. I know God's forgiven me.
name: Scott DesJarlais

quote: I wanted to marry a girl just like my mom.
name: Michael Bergin

quote: I might be celibate, but I appreciate the wonder of the sacrament of marriage.
name: Keith O'Brien

quote: That's my prescription for a happy marriage - marry someone who doesn't do anything similar to what you do.
name: Maxine Kumin

quote: Marriage is an exercise in torture.
name: Frances Conroy

quote: When a marriage works, nothing on earth can take its place.
name: Helen Gahagan
